text: G4 was an American pay television and digital network. It was owned by NBCUniversal. It mostly showed live music, game shows, late night anime, news, and reality TV. It started on April 24, 2002, under the ownership of Discovery Inc. It was shut down on New Year's Eve 2014. It was opened again in 2021, but shut down again in 2022. Category:American television channels Category:NBCUniversal Category:2002 establishments in the United States Category:2014 disestablishments in the United States
title: G4 (American TV network)
